title: Greater Albion Typefounders Releases Syondola
content:
Greater Albion venture into the Wild West-Syondola is released today:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013062345im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1d5a441f7d5f0da69fe18377d317e7_3484.gif)

You can read more about it at Greater Albion's Wordpress [Blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013062345/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/), or try is out at [MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013062345/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/syondola/).
author: Rasendyll
